q: Make yourself so useful to other people, that they think you are irreplaceable.
Get mad, then get over it.
Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadows.
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.
If you don't read the newspaper, you're uninformed. If you read the newspaper, you're misinformed.
Whatever is begun in anger, ends in shame.
Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
A change is brought about because ordinary people do extraordinary things.
Remain calm. Be kind.
Be a good animal, true to your instincts.
When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.
Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
In a world that is constantly changing, it is to our advantage to learn how to adapt and enjoy something better.
The way out is in.
Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile.
In the middle of chaos lies opportunity.
Better late than never.
Those who know, do. Those that understand, teach.
The only lost cause is one we give up on before we enter the struggle.
You can't have anything worthwhile without difficulties.
An intelligent person hires people who are more intelligent than he is.
Excuses are the lies you convince yourself are true to avoid proving you are worthy of the gift you were given.
Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
The power of man has grown in every sphere, except over himself.
Life is a series of choices and all we can do is make them.
Either you choose to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out into the ocean.
Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn.
Do what is right, not what is easy, nor what is popular.
Follow the man who seeks the truth; run from the man who has found it.
Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
Being a good example is the best form of service.
Force has no place where there is need of skill.
Start the day with love, spend the day with love, fill the day with love and end the day with love.
Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
The best fighter is never angry.
If a thing is worth doing, it is worth doing badly.
Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.
Where ever you are, you are one with the clouds and one with the sun and the stars you see. You are one with everything.
The soul without imagination is what an observatory would be without a telescope.
If we are not able to smile, then the world will not have peace.
The only way round is through.
Failure is an option, fear is not.
Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need.
